column2: ggplotly( ggplot(data[!(Origin==Destination),list(Throughput=sum(Throughput)),by=c("roots")][order(Throughput,roots,decreasing=TRUE)][1:5,],aes(x=as.factor(roots),y=Throughput))+geom_bar(fill="steelblue",bin = 50,width = 0.2 ,stat="identity",na.rm = TRUE)+geom_text(aes(label=Throughput), vjust=-1, color="black", size=3.4)+labs(title = "The top 5 busy roots of BART",x="Roots",y="Populations")+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,face = "bold",color = "black"))+theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
